microsim.gui.space

Class LayeredSurfacePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • microsim.gui.space.LayeredSurfacePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class LayeredSurfacePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Not of interest for users. It is the panel drawing the LayerDrawer objects added to the LayeredSurfaceFrame. It manages mouse events, too.

    Title: JAS

    Description: Java Agent-based Simulation library
